text: For the wave phenomenon, see sneaker wave. Seventh Wave may also refer to: * Seventh Wave (band), a British progressive rock band * Seventh Wave (Annie Crummer album) * Seventh Wave (GrimSkunk album) * Seventh Wave (System 7 album) * "Seventh Wave", the opening track on Devin Townsend's album Ocean Machine: Biomech * "Love Is the Seventh Wave", a song on Sting's album The Dream of the Blue Turtles * A fictional arms dealer group in the video game Black
title: Seventh Wave
